sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; const AddProduct = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [price, setPrice] = useState(0); const [imgUrl, setImgUrl] = useState(""); function addProductToDatabase() { const reqBody = { name: name, description: description, price: price, imgUrl: imgUrl } axios.post("/api/add/products", reqBody, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" } }) .then(response =>{ console.log(response.data); }) .ca } return (
<> Product Name setName(e.target.value)} /> Description setDescription(e.target.value)} /> Price setPrice(e.target.value)} /> Image URL setImgUrl(e.target.value)} />
); }; export default AddProduct;
